description.value:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon
Glowstone helmets are usually of gnomish manufacture. While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast a particular cantrip associated with that helmet (often @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.YEjQ3ADloS9QFghm]{dancing lights}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.TWVI2s8oV0TiSEKy]{light}, @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.QxIWdfDm7GSrxYBE]{mending}, or sometimes @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.PnWBk2Ep2NRfRDFK]{produce flame}). When combined with a @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressitems.Item.KPfrostglowweapo]{frostglow weapon} or a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.OU9GfiAuXuO8KUhv]{find the path} spell, this helmet allows you to sense the direction and distance to the nearest ley line, shadow road, radiant well, and similar arcane landmarks.
